works.imgTitle: Amanda and I arrive in Venice, first selfie
works.description: Our honeymoon adventure begins. Here we are crying on the Ponte degli Scalzi bridge right after we arrived in Venice and had been traveling for almost 24 hours.
The bed and breakfast where we stayed in Venice.

works.camera: Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF1 (top) and Panasonic Lumix DMC-G1 (bottom)
